name: halloween dream
description:
halloween dream is a multiplayer 4vs1 cartoon halloween game where one player takes on the role of the bad guy, and the other  players play as dreamer, trying to escape the dream and avoid being  stuck in the dream

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 730
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MG available space
